name: Demon Tag Online
description:
A simple game of tag with a dark twist, Demon Tag Online is a quick, 2 minute game where you must explore the changing abyssal mazes to find someone and pass on the curse before time runs out!

First created at Global Game Jam 2014's Glasgow site, Demon Tag Online is a 2 player online game of tag.

You can also play through a web browser via our version on Kongregate!

Controls

WASD - movement

Space bar - tag

1, 2, 3 - character skills

Contact

Questions, thoughts, comments, suggestions? Get in touch, we love it when you do!
